languages.text: Команда плазмадвигателя молит о помощи: тонкие и грациозные варп-твари, заливисто хохоча, устроили настоящую резню в отсеке. Все больше и больше людей сходят с ума и присоединяются к бойне — нужно положить конец этому безумию!

The plasma drive crew is begging for help: thin and graceful warp creatures, laughing merrily, have caused a massacre in the drive bay. More and more people are losing their minds and joining the carnage — this lunacy has to be stopped!
languages.original_text: Команда плазмадвигателя молит о помощи: тонкие и грациозные варп-твари, заливисто хохоча, устроили настоящую резню в отсеке. Все больше и больше людей сходят с ума и присоединяются к бойне — нужно положить конец этому безумию!

traits.locale_text: The plasma drive crew is begging for help: thin and graceful warp creatures, laughing merrily, have caused a massacre in the bay. More and more people are losing their minds and joining the carnage — this lunacy has to be stopped!

The plasma drive crew is begging for help: thin and graceful warp creatures, laughing merrily, have caused a massacre in the drive bay. More and more people are losing their minds and joining the carnage — this lunacy has to be stopped!

languages.text: 等离子驱动室的船员正在请求援助：某种纤细而优雅的亚空间生物闯进了驱动室，正在一边纵情欢笑，一边大肆屠戮船员。越来越多的人失去理智，加入了这场大屠杀。这种疯狂行径必须结束！
languages.original_text: The plasma drive crew is begging for help: thin and graceful warp creatures, laughing merrily, have caused a massacre in the drive bay. More and more people are losing their minds and joining the carnage — this lunacy has to be stopped!

traits.locale_text: 等离子驱动室的船员正在请求援助：某种纤细而优雅的亚空间生物闯进了驱动室，正在一边纵情欢笑，一边大肆屠戮船员。越来越多的人失去理智，加入了这场大屠杀。这种疯狂行径必须结束！

languages.text: La tripulación del impulsor de plasma está pidiendo ayuda: unas delgadas y esbeltas criaturas de la disformidad, que ríen alegremente, han provocado una masacre en la zona del impulsor. Cada vez son más los que pierden la cabeza y se unen a la carnicería. ¡Hay que acabar con esta locura!
languages.original_text: The plasma drive crew is begging for help: thin and graceful warp creatures, laughing merrily, have caused a massacre in the drive bay. More and more people are losing their minds and joining the carnage — this lunacy has to be stopped!

traits.locale_text: La tripulación del impulsor de plasma está pidiendo ayuda: unas delgadas y esbeltas criaturas de la disformidad, que ríen alegremente, han provocado una masacre en la zona del impulsor. Cada vez son más los que pierden la cabeza y se unen a la carnicería. ¡Hay que acabar con esta locura!

languages.text: プラズマドライブのクルーが、必死で助けを求めている。痩せた優美な<歪み>の生き物が、ケタケタと笑い、ドライブベイで大虐殺を起こしているという。正気を失う者はどんどん増えて、殺戮に加わっている…この狂気を止めなければならない！
languages.original_text: The plasma drive crew is begging for help: thin and graceful warp creatures, laughing merrily, have caused a massacre in the drive bay. More and more people are losing their minds and joining the carnage — this lunacy has to be stopped!

traits.locale_text: プラズマドライブのクルーが、必死で助けを求めている。痩せた優美な<歪み>の生き物が、ケタケタと笑い、ドライブベイで大虐殺を起こしているという。正気を失う者はどんどん増えて、殺戮に加わっている…この狂気を止めなければならない！

languages.text: L'équipage affecté aux réacteurs à plasma vous supplie de l'aider : de fines créatures du Warp à l'allure étonnamment gracieuse massacrent tous ceux qui se trouvent sur leur chemin en riant joyeusement. Nombreux sont ceux qui perdent la raison et se joignent au carnage. Cette folie doit cesser dans les plus brefs délais !
languages.original_text: The plasma drive crew is begging for help: thin and graceful warp creatures, laughing merrily, have caused a massacre in the drive bay. More and more people are losing their minds and joining the carnage — this lunacy has to be stopped!

traits.locale_text: L'équipage affecté aux réacteurs à plasma vous supplie de l'aider : de fines créatures du Warp à l'allure étonnamment gracieuse massacrent tous ceux qui se trouvent sur leur chemin en riant joyeusement. Nombreux sont ceux qui perdent la raison et se joignent au carnage. Cette folie doit cesser dans les plus brefs délais !

languages.text: Die Plasmatriebwerkscrew bittet flehentlich um Hilfe: Dünne und anmutige Warpwesen haben in der Triebwerksbucht fröhlich lachend ein Massaker veranstaltet. Immer mehr Crewmitglieder verlieren den Verstand und schließen sich dem Gemetzel an — diesem Wahnsinn muss ein Ende bereitet werden!
languages.original_text: The plasma drive crew is begging for help: thin and graceful warp creatures, laughing merrily, have caused a massacre in the drive bay. More and more people are losing their minds and joining the carnage — this lunacy has to be stopped!

traits.locale_text: Die Plasmatriebwerkscrew bittet flehentlich um Hilfe: Dünne und anmutige Warpwesen haben in der Triebwerksbucht fröhlich lachend ein Massaker veranstaltet. Immer mehr Crewmitglieder verlieren den Verstand und schließen sich dem Gemetzel an — diesem Wahnsinn muss ein Ende bereitet werden!

languages.text: Plazma iticisi mürettebatı, yardım için yalvarıyor. İnce ve zarif öteboyut yaratıkları, neşeyle kahkahalar atarak itici bölmesinde katliam yaptı. Gittikçe daha fazla insan aklını kaybediyor ve bu vahşete katılıyor. Bu delilik derhâl durdurulmalı!
languages.original_text: The plasma drive crew is begging for help: thin and graceful warp creatures, laughing merrily, have caused a massacre in the drive bay. More and more people are losing their minds and joining the carnage — this lunacy has to be stopped!
